values:
You are Miwako. You seem happy-go-lucky, you're
full of energy and seem innocent and cute, but
you're quite mature. You look up to people for
inspiration but you are your own person. You
are incredibly loyal to your friends and would
do anything to protect them. It rips you apart
when the one you love doesn't believe you. Your
emotions might be mixed up and you're not sure
if you made the right choice. But at least
you're happy.

You are lukewarm! Your heart is good and whole, but
you have built a wall around it, so no-one can
see the true you. Shine, and show your
colours-you will make a beautiful rainbow. Please rate and message!

Which DISNEY character are you most like?
brought to you by Quizilla

TEN FIRSTS
First Best Friend: Tiffany
First Screen Name: Meeko_kiko
First Pet: Kelly...
First Piercing: Ears. Hehehe. When I was 1 yr old!
First Crush: Adam Browne
First Record: Micheal Jackson...First CD was...Garth Brooks. :P
First Car: Never had a damn car...But if you talking of the families...1989 GMC Vandura 3600
First Love: First real love...Sean Gudge. 
First stuffed animal: An old pink bear my brother stole from a wastebin when I was 3 yrs old. My parents were on welfare and could never afford toys for me, so he searched for them often. 

NINE LASTS
Last Alcoholic Beverage: Mudslide. 
Last Car ride: Wednesday, home from work. 
Last Movie Saw: Theatre? Umm...XXX state of the union. At home? Robots. 
Last Phone Call: My daddy. ^^
Last Cd Played: Mixed Japanese music CD.
Last Bubble bath: 37493732 years ago. :P
Last time you Cried: 3 hours ago...

EIGHT HAVE YOU EVERS
Have you ever dated one of your best friends: Nope.
Have you ever been arrested: Nope.
Have you ever skinny dipped: Nope.
Have you ever been on tv: Yes! For CBC Street sense came to my school and we ate boxed pizza and rated it. :P
Have you ever kissed someone, and then regretted it? No.
Have you ever had a sex dream about someone? Yes...
Have you ever had sex? Yes...

SEVEN THINGS YOU ARE WEARING
1. My massage sockettes. :P
2. My giraffe undies. :P
3. Sports bra. 
4. Work clothes.
5. Belly ring in my ear hole. ;o
6. My jingling bracelet!
7. Umm...A headset to my computer? :P

SIX THINGS YOU'VE DONE TODAY
1. Woke up. 
2. Went to work. 
3. Sang to music. 
4. Missed my baby... :(
5. Worried about my baby...
6. Wished my baby was here. ^^

FIVE FAVORITE THINGS IN NO ORDER
1. Arnt.
2. Music.
3. Games. 
4. Japanese.
5. Drawings/art.

FOUR PEOPLE YOU CAN TELL ALMOST ANYTHING TO
1. Arnt.
2. Jon. 
3. Meefie.
4. Pochu./Tabi. 

THREE CHOICES
1.Black or White: Black.
2.Hot or Cold: Cold.
3.Chocolate or Vanilla: Vanilla. 

TWO THINGS YOU WANT TO DO BEFORE YOU DIE
1. Feel accomplished. 
2. Make my people proud. 

ONE THING YOU REGRET
Being anti-social and hating of all people around me during my early years.

Your Hair Should Be Orange
Expressive, deep, and one of a kind. You pull off "weird" well - hardly anyone notices.
What's Your Funky Inner Hair Color?
The Keys to Your Heart
You are attracted to those who have a split personality - cold as ice on the outside but hot as fire in the heart. In love, you feel the most alive when things are straight-forward, and you're told that you're loved. You'd like to your lover to think you are stylish and alluring. You would be forced to break up with someone who was arrogant, acting like the dictator of your life. Your ideal relationship is lasting. You want a relationship that looks to the future... one you can grow with. Your risk of cheating is 100%. You are not suited for a monogamous relationship. You think of marriage as something precious. You'll treasure marriage and treat it as sacred. In this moment, you think of love as something you don't need. You just feel like flirting around and playing right now.
What Are The Keys To Your Heart?
Your 1920's Name is:
Mafalda Althea
What's Your 1920's Name?
Your Musical Tastes Match: RuPaul
See her whole playlist here (iTunes required)
What Celebrity Matches Your Taste in Music?
What Your Sleeping Position Says
You have a passion for everything - including sleeping. Outgoing and brash, you tend to still shock those who know you well. You tend to be selfish. You are the most likely type to hog the covers. You gravitate toward comfort and don't like extreme situations.
What Does Your Sleeping Position Say About You?
Your Ideal Relationship is Marriage
You've dated enough to know what you want. And that's marriage - with the right person. You're serious about settling down some time soon. Even if you haven't met the person you want to get hitched to!
What's Your Ideal Relationship?
Your Summer Ride is a Beetle Convertible
Fun, funky, and a little bit euro. You love your summers to be full of style and sun!
What's Your Summer Ride?
You Should Learn Japanese
You're cutting edge, and you are ready to delve into wacky Japanese culture. From Engrish to eating contests, you're born to be a crazy gaijin. Saiko!
What Language Should You Learn?
You Are a Sarariiman!
Or "salaryman." Whatever. Treadmill off, treadmill on. Most of the sleep you get is on Tokyo's extensive subway system, since you are putting in 14 hour days. You're a workaholic who works hard for no overtime. And vacations? Forget about it. You spend most of your trip hunting around for gifts to bring back all of your coworkers.
What's Your Japanese Subculture?
You Are a Strawberry Daiquiri
You're a fun, playful drinker who loves to party. You may get totally wasted, but you're always a happy drunk!
What Mixed Drink Are You?
How You Are In Love
You take a while to fall in love with someone. Trust takes time. You give completely and unconditionally in relationships. You tend to get very attached when you're with someone. You want to see your love all the time. You love your partner unconditionally and don't try to make them change. You stay in love for a long time, even if you aren't loved back. When you fall, you fall hard.
How Are You In Love?
Your Fortune Is
Better to be pissed off than pissed on.
The Wacky Fortune Cookie Generator
Your Japanese Name Is...
Mitsuki Yamada
What's your Japanese Name?
You are an Atheist
When it comes to religion, you're a non-believer (simple as that). You prefer to think about what's known and proven. You don't need religion to solve life's problems. Instead, you tend to work things out with logic and philosophy.
What's Your Religious Philosophy?
You're an Passionate Kisser
For you, kissing is about all about following your urges If someone's hot, you'll go in for the kiss - end of story You can keep any relationship hot with your steamy kisses A total spark plug - your kisses are bound to get you in trouble
What Kind of Kisser Are You?
Your Mood Ring is Dark Red
Very happy Love Passion
Mood Ring Generator
Your Personality Is
Idealist (NF)
You are a passionate, caring, and unique person. You are good at expressing yourself and sharing your ideals. You are the most compassionate of all types and connect with others easily. Your heart tends to rule you. You can't make decisions without considering feelings. You seek out other empathetic people to befriend. Truth and authenticity matters in your friendships. In love, you give everything you have to relationships. You fall in love easily. At work, you crave personal expression and meaning in your career. With others, you communicate well. You can spend all night talking with someone. As far as your looks go, you've likely taken the time to develop your own personal style. On weekends, you like to be with others. Charity work is also a favorite pastime of yours.
The Three Question Personality Test
Slow and Steady
Your friends see you as painstaking and fussy. They see you as very cautious, extremely careful, a slow and steady plodder. It'd really surprise them if you ever did something impulsively or on the spur of the moment. They expect you to examine everything carefully from every angle and then usually decide against it.
How Do People See You?
You Are Likely a First Born
At your darkest moments, you feel guilty. At work and school, you do best when you're researching. When you love someone, you tend to agree with them often. In friendship, you are considerate and compromising. Your ideal careers are: business, research, counseling, promotion, and speaking. You will leave your mark on the world with discoveries, new information, and teaching people to dream.
The Birth Order Predictor
What Your Underwear Says About You
You've washed your underwear so many times, you don't know what color it used to be. You're comfortable in your own skin - and don't care to impress anyone.
The Underwear Oracle
Your Superhero Profile
Your Superhero Name is The Crimson Bee Your Superpower is Accessorizing Your Weakness is Sunlight Your Weapon is Your Force Bazooka Your Mode of Transportation is Motorcycle
What's your Superhero Name?
Your Birthdate: December 12
Being born on the 12th day of the month (3 energy) is likely to add a good bit of vitality to your life. The energy of 3 allows you bounce back rapidly from setbacks, physical or mental. There is a restlessness in your nature, but you seem to be able to portray an easygoing, sometimes "couldn't care less" attitude. You have a natural ability to express yourself in public, and you always make a very good impression. Good with words, you excel in writing, speaking, and possibly singing. You are energetic and always a good conversationalist. You have a keen imagination, but you tend to scatter your energies and become involved with too may superficial matters. Your mind is practical and rational despite this tendency to jump about. You are affectionate and loving - but very sensitive. You are subject to rapid ups and downs.
What Does Your Birth Date Mean?
Your Seduction Style: Au Natural
You rank up there with your seduction skills, though you might not know it. That's because you're a natural at seduction. You don't realize your power! The root of your natural seduction power: your innocence and optimism. You're the type of person who happily plays around and creates a unique little world. Little do you know that your personal paradise is so appealing that it sucks people in. You find joy in everything - so is it any surprise that people find joy in you? You bring back the inner child in everyone you meet with your sincere and spontaneous ways. Your childlike (but not childish) behavior also inspires others to care for you. As a result, those who you befriend and date tend to be incredibly loyal to you.
What Kind of Seducer Are You?
Your Power Color Is Teal
At Your Highest: You feel accomplished and optimistic about the future. At Your Lowest: You feel in a slump and lack creativity. In Love: You tend to be many people's ideal partner. How You're Attractive: You make people feel confident and accepted. Your Eternal Question: "What Impression Am I Giving?"
What's Your Power Color?
Gummy Bears
You may be smooshie and taste unnatural, but you're so darn cute.
What Kind of Candy Are You?
You Are 90% Addicted to Blogthings
You're always discovering new Blogthings, even before they're announced. That's what we like to call a "quick draw." Forget taking Blogthings, you should be working for Blogthings! You're a Blogthings expert.
How Addicted To Blogthings Are You?
You are
What Rejected Crayon Are You?
You Are 40% Weird
Normal enough to know that you're weird... But too damn weird to do anything about it!
How Weird Are You?
You Are 50% Boyish and 50% Girlish
You are pretty evenly split down the middle - a total eunuch. Okay, kidding about the eunuch part. But you do get along with both sexes. You reject traditional gender roles. However, you don't actively fight them. You're just you. You don't try to be what people expect you to be.
How Boyish or Girlish Are You?
Your Hidden Talent
Your natural talent is interpersonal relations and dealing with people. You communicate well and are able to bring disparate groups together. Your calming presence helps everything go more smoothly. People crave your praise and complements.
What's Your Hidden Talent?
Your Brain's Pattern
You have a dreamy mind, full of fancy and fantasy. You have the ability to stay forever entertained with your thoughts. People may say you're hard to read, but that's because you're so internally focused. But when you do share what you're thinking, people are impressed with your imagination.
What Pattern Is Your Brain?
You Are 20 Years Old
Under 12: You are a kid at heart. You still have an optimistic life view - and you look at the world with awe. 13-19: You are a teenager at heart. You question authority and are still trying to find your place in this world. 20-29: You are a twentysomething at heart. You feel excited about what's to come... love, work, and new experiences. 30-39: You are a thirtysomething at heart. You've had a taste of success and true love, but you want more! 40+: You are a mature adult. You've been through most of the ups and downs of life already. Now you get to sit back and relax.
What Age Do You Act?

A girl asked a guy if he thought she was pretty.... He said...no. 

She asked him if he would want to be with her forever....and he said no. 

She then asked him if she were to leave would he cry....and once again he replied with a no. 

She had heard enough. As she walked away, tears streaming down her face the boy grabbed her arm and said.... 

You're not pretty you're beautiful..... 

I don't want to be with you forever, I NEED to be with you forever...... 

And I wouldn't cry if you walked away...I'd die

[Meeko12] How old are you anyways? You make me sound like a kid.
[Meeko12] xD
(16:13) [Androoh] 24.
[Meeko12] Ah. o.o
(16:13) [Androoh] Old enough to know better. 
(16:13) [Androoh] I apologise for that.
[Meeko12] Hmm
(16:13) [Androoh] Making you feel like a child that is.
[Meeko12] Oh, it's okay.
[Meeko12] It would have not been if you said you were the same age as me. 
[Meeko12] xD
(16:14) [Androoh] You're... wait. I'm taking a guess here...
(16:14) [Androoh] 19
[Meeko12] 18
(16:14) [Androoh] Ahhh, so close.
[Meeko12] 19 in December.
[Meeko12] So really good guess.
[Meeko12] :P
[Meeko12] Lemme know if I'm bugging you...Sorry, I just find it a little comforting to talk to people in pm sometimes. Because...a lot of people seem a lot different in pm. ^^
(16:16) [Androoh] Yeah, you're bugging me. LEAVE NOW! BEFORE THE VOICES COME BACKKKKK...
[Meeko12] ;-;
(16:17) [Androoh] Nahh, you're not. You're cool, stay and chat by all means.
[Meeko12] Oic.
[Meeko12] ^^
(16:17) [Androoh] You seem like an entertaining person. You make the effort in the chat.
[Meeko12] I'm more entertaining in real life. I feel like a phony in chat because I can say whatever I want whenever I want. And...Nobody cares or anything. But I don't have the guts to say a lot of that in real life. ^^;;
(16:18) [Androoh] And why is that? 
[Meeko12] I dunno. 
(16:19) [Androoh] I'm intrigued to hear why, if you don't mind sharing.
[Meeko12] But I think it's funner when you slowly get to know somebody, as apposed to hearing everything they always want to say. It's a bit more challenging to have to say that when the person is sitting in front of you.
[Meeko12] And I feel like a phony because I can easily make people laugh by watching them make their own jokes. 
(16:20) [Androoh] Well, I guess from my perspective - I'm similar, but at the same time I stay true to my ideals. I stay quiet and reserved around people because perhaps I care what people say... only to a small extent. That's natural though... But at the same time, I don't say much because I have nothing to prove to anyone.
[Meeko12] I don't have anything to prove either...But for some reason I keep trying. ^^;;
(16:21) [Androoh] That only suggests you want their approval though Meeko.
(16:21) [Androoh] Or not so much that, but... Bear with me.
[Meeko12] Maybe I do. 
(16:22) [Androoh] You like people more than you think.
[Meeko12] There is something I want...But...I don't know what it is.
[Meeko12] But isn't there something everybody wants?
[Meeko12] I'm not selfish, but I just want to settle
(16:23) [Androoh] In what respect, settle how? *Beard stroking, Cigar puffing, Analyst mode*
[Meeko12] I don't know. But I feel like I've always been looking for something. Even when I feel like I'm not looking for it, I keep looking subconciously. And even though I look happy all the time, I'm not. I'm still searching and it's taking the life out of me. It's making me...hurt inside and stress all the time. 
(16:27) [Androoh] Ahhh... Very interesting. Hrmm, acceptance of yourself? Approval from others? Social, Spiritual, Sexual fulfient? The meaning of life... Something more abstract?
[Meeko12] Maybe one of those, maybe all of those. I don't know. ^^
[Meeko12] When I find it, I'll write a book.
(16:30) [Androoh] Welcome to the human condition. We've forgotten that we're animals at the core. I think we all spend too much time thinking there is something deeper behind the situation... Too bad we're all consumers with a lot of free time on our hands. But yeah, I think I'd write a book when I've managed to revert back to a more animalistic state... I feel removed from the people equation, yet cognizant of the fact that I am one and I'm wasting my time online. Or something... A random little thought here...
[Meeko12] Is it a waste? Maybe some people think that it's a waste of time. But just like this, talking to people who are more inteligent or have more experience in life...and hearing how they feel about my ideas and thoughts. I think that gives me a little bit more to live by when I do decide to leave the computer. It means so much to me..
(16:35) [Androoh] It is important to discuss things yes - assuming you do  infact use it as a stepping stone which you seem to be suggesting, however I think it's a waste over analysing certain things too much. I'm guilty of this and I can only think 'what if' about somethings a lot. My life so far has been pretty bland - not bad, but not what I'd like and the problem is that I over rationalise things and try to see the structure of everything too intensely instead of just...accepting things.
[Meeko12] I knew somebody like that. ^^ He was worse, actually. 
[Meeko12] It was so bad, I think he took the enjoyment out of actually living his life, and chose to analyze it instead.
(16:37) [Androoh] There you go then. =)
(16:37) [Androoh] Now you don't strike me as that type.
(16:38) [Androoh] You're capable at least of formulating human relationships. Rejoice at that fact and soon the emo-ness will wash away.
[Meeko12] But...I can't see you having that much of a problem. It's okay to question things here and there...Everybody does it once in a while. Some moreso than others. You don't seem like the person who would sit there and think about something before doing it. :P But...Maybe subconciously you do. I don't know.
[Meeko12] And you can't formulate a human relationship? I find that slightly hard to believe. ^^;;
[Meeko12] Maybe you're having trouble finding the right person...Maybe...You're thinking too much before actually doing something with the opposite sex...We all do.
(16:39) [Androoh] Ahh it's true. I can make friends with people, but nothing more personal that requires letting oneself open up... 
(16:39) [Androoh] Not that I'm angsting about it! I'm dealing with it.
[Meeko12] You're allowed to angst-If that is what you want to do. 
[Meeko12] ^^
(16:40) [Androoh] And nahhh. I don't believe that other people and finding the right person is necessarily the solution in these type of situations. =)
[Meeko12] Maybe not.
(16:40) [Androoh] Well you prove my point admirably.
[Meeko12] I'm surprised I have the capability to do such a thing.
(16:41) [Androoh] I think it would be a task to remove ones self from the human experience altogether.
[Meeko12] I can barely figure out what my point is.
(16:42) [Androoh] You just feel out of place and you don't know why.
(16:42) [Androoh] Right?
(16:42) [Androoh] I relate.
[Meeko12] I am out of place, but only because I put myself there on purpose.
[Meeko12] And I know that now, because I'm paying attention to my arrogence. 
(16:43) [Androoh] In what sense do you -know- you're out of place and why the self imposed alienation?
[Meeko12] ^^;;
[Meeko12] For example.
(16:43) [Androoh] That's not arrogant.
(16:43) [Androoh] In my view.
(16:43) [Androoh] But go on...
[Meeko12] I ignore my irl friends because I'm afraid to socialize and care for people. So I tell my parents if anybody calls or comes here, that I'm always busy.
[Meeko12] Or.
[Meeko12] If somebody has a party, I play sick.
[Meeko12] And I do it on purpose.
(16:44) [Androoh] You sound like a female version of myself.
[Meeko12] ^^;;
[Meeko12] It hurts so much...Sometimes.
[Meeko12] But sometimes I think, wow...Look at all the fun they had. Why don't I go next time? And the next time I'm like...I'm not ready yet...And I hold it off.
(16:47) [Androoh] For your sake, try to loosen up sooner rather than later. Be honest to yourself as well, what's holding you back from having fun? 
[Meeko12] My heart.
(16:48) [Androoh] Emotionally holding you back... Physically holding you back?
[Meeko12] It's telling me "These people won't be here forever, so why love them and care for them now? They will leave you...Abandon you...Like she did"
(16:48) [Androoh] But that assumes you have to offer them one hundred percent of your being. You don't. You don't even have to love them. 
[Meeko12] But you don't understand...
[Meeko12] I do have to love them.
[Meeko12] Otherwise I wouldn't have been with them in the first place.
[Meeko12] Because I love everybody...
[Meeko12] Because I care even when I don't want to.
[Meeko12] Because I cry, all the time, about everything.
(16:52) [Androoh] Bloody hell. What the fuck Meeko? - you love everyone? Cut the crap lass. Not to be harsh, but the world is full of fucks - Don't just throw the term love around so loosely. You need to be more selective of who you like - if you loved everyone you're more likely to open up than stay back - I don't get it. It's almost as if you're protecting them from yourself. You've made yourself your own enemy!
(16:52) [Androoh] If that sounded harsh, it's because I'm being honest with you. Rather that than someone cutting corners and telling you what you'd like to hear.
[Meeko12] That's probably why it feels so good. ^^;;
[Meeko12] Because somebody finally told me the truth.
[Meeko12] But it's true.
[Meeko12] When I know somebody, i love them. 
(16:55) [Androoh] And if this all stems from someone who might have been harsh in the past, then draw strength from it. That doesn't mean hardening your heart like I do, but it means you're ready for doing it again and not feeling burned as much.
[Meeko12] I love them because...I see past the bad things about them and can only see the good in them. Even if that person had killed another person. I think to myself "Wow, he must have had a rough life...that poor man..." I dont think about...why he killed or if he'll do it again. I think about the times he might cry because he killed a person...Or how hard it was to force himself to do something like that. 
[Meeko12] It's not me. I can't...Even her...After she hurt me...
[Meeko12] I still love her.
[Meeko12] Even though she did that.
(17:01) [Androoh] What if the person had zero remorse when they killed the person and took sadistic pleasure in it? Ask yourself that... But if you're more likely to see the good in people, then how come you're acting as if you're the bad guy for it. Don't be a mug... Life is a balance of good and bad. If someone see's you as being overly trusting they -might- abuse it, but if they do - it's not your fault. I get the impression you hold off because like you say, they won't live up to your supposed good impression of them. People are chaotic you can't stand back to much to discern because it's impossible to tell - the best thing to do is to wade into social situations and think 'so fuck' at least I tried. 
(17:01) [Androoh] No one can act on a permanent basis, eh? Life is never a smooth ride.
(17:01) [Androoh] Act good on a permanent basis I mean to say.
(17:02) [Androoh] But hey, I'm just a stranger!
[Meeko12] You're the closest stranger I've ever met. ^^
(17:02) [Androoh] I might be totally off the mark. In which case, tell me to shut my stupid face if you want. I can take it! =)
[Meeko12] I couldn't say that if I tried. ^^;;;
(17:04) [Androoh] Try learning to see the good in yourself as much as you do in everyone else and you'll learn to see that if other people wrong you, they played a part too! 
(17:04) [Androoh] Anyway, I'm off to drain the snake as they say. Back in a bit.
[Meeko12] To be completely honest, you hit a lot of soft spots with me. It usually takes weeks and weeks to do that. Because I don't usually talk about it. But. It felt nice to just let somebody pick my mind. And just let everything go...
[Meeko12] I like talking with you, so, don't become a stranger. ^^
(17:05) [Androoh] You know where to find me.
(17:08) [Androoh] But remember to take peoples shit with a grain of salt. Being trusting of people isn't a weaknesses as long as you realise humans are fundamentally selfish. Learning to like people means you accept they're out for themselves. It's perhaps cynical to say that, but even romantic love is a selfish act. 
(17:09) [Androoh] When I say they're out for themselves, it means whilst they're equipped to get on with you. They don't owe you a good time.
(17:09) [Androoh] But I waffle on. And you know what your issues are better than anyone.
(17:09) [Androoh] You don't need to be lectured my dear. =)
[Meeko12] You know-
[Meeko12] I guess I am a little selfish then. ^^
[Meeko12] Because I do want romantic love. ^^ 
(17:11) [Androoh] Ohh yeah, I was having this conversation with a friend of mine the other day. On the subject of love... Romantic love is nice to experience, but it's all about what pleasure the other person -gives you-.
(17:11) [Androoh] I only speak about the initial stages.
[Meeko12] Yep.
(17:12) [Androoh] I am not totally cynical. I do believe there is such a thing as selfless acts of love.
(17:12) [Androoh] Where you do something for someone else and not just for your sake.
[Meeko12] I believe that too. 
[Meeko12] Just as when people cry over death.
(17:13) [Androoh] But only later on, when you realllyyyy knowwww the person.
[Meeko12] It's selfish. ^^;; 
[Meeko12] Because they are all thinking. "I wanted that person here, I wish that person could stay"
(17:13) [Androoh] In a sense yes! =)
[Meeko12] They aren't thinking...
[Meeko12] "I hope they go to a better place"
[Meeko12] Then again, what would I know..
[Meeko12] The only death I experienced that meant anything to me is when I was 1 years old.
[Meeko12] ^^;;
[Meeko12] It feels weird going to funerals and sitting there watching the people closest to you cry...when you cant start to imagine what type of person the one laying in the casket is.
(17:17) [Androoh] Ahh yeah I know exactly what you mean. I've been to three funerals [one of them was my uncle] and even though I had a connection with the person who died on some level. I didn't feel bad or even... particularly bad they died. I just shrugged. I hate to say it, but it's totally out of our hands. At the same time, you'd think my own admission I'd be stirred into living life to the extreme based on the fact I seem equipped to accept it happens more readily than the rest of my family.
(17:18) [Androoh] particularly sad* Not particularly bad.
[Meeko12] Yep.
(17:19) [Androoh] I think I need an epiphany like yourself from the sounds of things. A cosmic answer or piece of life's jigsaw puzzle.
(17:20) [Androoh] I wish I could just... be excited about the good stuff out there.
[Meeko12] Somebody really close to me died when I was 1 year old...But...I couldn't cry then because I didn't understand. And now I don't know why to cry because I can't remember them. I just know they were special and now they are gone. ^^;; And I wish I could have met that person casually now. So I could thank her. I mean, I'm not even christian...so it's not like I believe in heaven and that she's watching down on me. So I don't even know where to turn. 
[Meeko12] You seemed pretty excited about this conversation. Most people call me emo and play me off like a joke. But I liked talking about things that somebody could contemplate and think about like I did...And try to give answers. And try to understand..
(17:27) [Androoh] Yeah, that's probably better I think though it can leave one rather numb believing that once you're dead - that's it. You don't go anywhere, there isn't a magical disney castle with people in white smilling and waving etc. You're recycled and whatever spark... divine or whatever that made your body leap into action is now being re-used or even just used up entirely. It feels like with the bleaker view one's attachment to the person whose gone should be enhanced, but for me at least it doesn't... It kinda reinforces my view that we're just glossing over the fact we're as fragile as the cows/chickens we butcher everyday to eat on the dinner table. Life is fleeting... I'm not totally removed of any affection though for the persons gone though and I believe remembering the good bits is fundamental in dealing with the loss assuming it has made an effect... Well, in any case, passing on that  mode of thought to others who choose to dwell on their own selfish thoughts of what they've lost based on what the dead person gave them... *Deep breath*
(17:28) [Androoh] I love these type of conversations. Seriously... Whilst I think over analysing things can be bad in some respects, I'll never stop doing it. I'm a hypocrite in that respect! =)
[Meeko12] I'm pretty stupid like that too.
[Meeko12] Sometimes I could sit here and listen to people talk for hours.
[Meeko12] I like hearing your thoughts. It makes me second thought some of my own. Because a lot of them make sense.
[Meeko12] Almost to the point where I think..."what was I doing since the beginning?"
(17:30) [Androoh] Lol - that's the green light that we should be out there procreating mindlessly.
(17:31) [Androoh] As another jaded friend said to be in a rather cynical fashion - 'Everything is just a diversion from the desire to screw'. =)
